description: Find Out More Information About CJ Moro, Front-End Javascript/React Developer
about: Hello! I'm a passionate web developer specializing in creating dynamic and visually compelling web applications. With a strong foundation in front-end and back-end technologies, my skill set includes Javascript/Typescript, React coupled with Redux, Gatsby, Sass, D3.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. I am deeply fascinated by the endless possibilities that visual technologies offer and am committed to crafting user-centric experiences. I pride myself on being a perpetual learner; my tech stack is ever-expanding as I strive to stay updated with the latest industry trends.

qualities.text: Starting with UX/UI and ending with my code, I strive to keep everything clean, easy to use, and intuitive.
My project are responsive and perform well on various screen types.
I develop fast, performant pages in a timely manner.
I'm a motivated fast learner. So I get around development obstacles by learning.
